methods.name: GetEnterOuterVolumeEvent
methods.comment: Get the event that is played whenever you get close to the ambient volume

methods.name: GetEnterInnerVolumeEvent
methods.comment: Get the event that is played whenever you get close to the ambient volume

methods.name: OnEnterOuterVolume
methods.comment: Called when we are getting close to the attenuation radius of the ambient volume

methods.name: OnExitOuterVolume
methods.comment: Called when we are far away from the attenuation radius of the ambient volume

methods.name: OnEnterInnerVolume
methods.comment: Called when the camera is entering the the ambient volume

methods.name: OnExitInnerVolume
methods.comment: Called when the camera is leaving the ambient volume

methods.name: ShouldIgnoreListenerRotation
methods.comment: Check if we should ignore the rotation of the listener when inside the volume

methods.name: CheckForErrors
methods.comment: Check for errors in the settings

properties.name: mOnEnterOuterVolumeEvent
properties.comment: Event to post when OnGetClose is triggered

properties.name: mOnExitOuterVolumeEvent
properties.comment: Event to post when OnGetFar is triggered

properties.name: mOnEnterInnerVolumeEvent
properties.comment: Event to post when OnEnter is triggered

properties.name: mOnExitInnerVolumeEvent
properties.comment: Event to post when OnExit is triggered

properties.name: mIgnoreListenerRotation
properties.comment: If checked, then we don't rotate the audio source to match the rotation of the listener when inside the volume

properties.name: mHave_GetEnterOuterVolumeEvent
properties.comment: Members to optimize all native events, so we don't have to pay the cost for using BlueprintNativeEvents if they ain't used
